description: This file defines the interface for a dispatcher component in a proxy module, declaring the IDispatcher interface with methods for validation, invocation, subscription, and local dispatching, as well as a nested callback interface, ICallback.

classes.name: IDispatcher
classes.description: Interface for dispatching operations, including validation, invocation, and callback management.

classes.name: IDispatcher::ICallback
classes.description: Callback interface for event, error, response, subscribe, and unsubscribe notifications.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token for a specific method with optional parameters.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a method with parameters and manages response via callback.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revoke a callback, unregistering it from notifications.

methods.name: Local
methods.description: Returns a local dispatcher instance if activated locally.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: Handles an event with specified parameters.

methods.name: Error
methods.description: Reports an error with channel, id, code, and message.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Provides a response for a given channel and id.

methods.name: Subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to an event with a designator.

methods.name: Unsubscribe
methods.description: Unsubscribes from an event with a designator.

ctags.name: ICallback
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL ICallback : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDispatcher
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IDispatcher : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
